thread.section_title: Campanile Paris 19 - La Villette - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very close to the metro station!
thread.title_full: Very close to the metro station! - Review of Campanile Paris 19 - La Villette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ale973
title: Very close to the metro station!
text: Very nice hotel. I stayed here with my girlfriend for a weekend and it was perfect. 4 minutes walk from Corentin Cariou metro station (line 7). There are also two supermarkets. The room was not too big, but it was very comfy and clean. The hotel staff was very kind. The hotel restaurant is worth a try, it gives you a good buffet breakfast, but don't expect too much even if I guess this is the best you can get from a Paris Hotel. Try also the restaurant in the evening, it offers you some interesting dishes.
